words.definition: An object that explodes.
words.example: The bomb destroyed the old house.

words.definition: A document that says something is true.
words.example: He got a certificate for finishing the course.

words.definition: An event that affects a situation.
words.example: We succeeded under difficult circumstances.

words.definition: A box used to bury dead people.
words.example: The body was placed in a wooden coffin.

words.definition: To deal with a difficult situation.
words.example: She is coping well with her new job.

words.definition: Saying what is bad about something.
words.example: The movie received a lot of criticism.

words.definition: To destroy something completely.
words.example: The flood devastated the town.

words.definition: To look unhappy with your face.
words.example: He frowned when I told him the news.

words.definition: To look at something for a long time.
words.example: She gazed at the stars all night.

words.definition: To look at something quickly.
words.example: He glanced at his watch.

words.definition: Very deep sadness.
words.example: She felt great grief after her dog died.

words.definition: A man who is getting married.
words.example: The groom looked very happy at the wedding.

words.definition: A document giving permission.
words.example: You need a license to drive a car.

words.definition: A tool used to see very small things.
words.example: Scientists use microscopes to see germs.

words.definition: Related to the energy of atoms.
words.example: The city uses nuclear power for electricity.

words.definition: To describe or show in a picture.
words.example: The book portrays him as a hero.

words.definition: To turn around in a circle.
words.example: The Earth rotates once every 24 hours.

words.definition: Something you keep to remember a place.
words.example: I bought a souvenir in Paris.

words.definition: A boat that can go underwater.
words.example: The submarine traveled deep in the sea.

words.definition: To find or follow something.
words.example: The police traced the phone call.
